hadiths.text: It was narrated that Suhaib, the Companion of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"I passed by the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) when he was praying, and greeted him with Salam. He returned my greeting with a gesture, or maybe it was just with his finger

chapter.ara-name: باب رَدِّ السَّلاَمِ بِالإِشَارَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Returning the salams with a gesture when praying
